revisionDesc.change: Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - lin1 Yes, μου is a misreading, but there is no (ὑπὲρ): Read ὁμοί̣(ως). The end of the line runs <:(ἀναλώμ(ατος))=PN G. Papaioannou (from photo)|ed|(ἀναλώμα(τος)):> <:μου=PN N. Gonis (from photo)|ed|(ὁμοί̣(ως)):> <:τῶν=PN G. Papaioannou (from photo)|ed|:> || lin2 remove comma from before (ἡμερ(ῶν)) (and remove space after <:) and after <#θ=9#> | τέσσαρα => <:τέσσερα=PN N. Gonis (from photo)|ed| τέσσαρα:> (I wouldn’t |reg|τέσσερα). — Before finalization, please move the updated text of p.oxy.descr;;20 to SB 22 15368, delete it from p.oxy.descr;;20, and update xml records.

Submit - l.1, οἰν[ο]χ̣[ε]ι̣ρ̣[ιστο]ῦ̣ -> οἰν[ο]χ̣[ε]ι̣ρ̣(ιστοῦ). The oblique abbreviation stroke can be seen above the -ερ- ligature directly below. l.1, λαμπροτάτῳ -> λαμπρ(οτ)ά(τῳ). after ρ there is an oblique stroke, α sumperimposed. I have not managed to find λαμπρότατος abbreviated this way elsewhere. l. 1, (ὑπὲρ) -> λόγῳ. l.1, ἀναλώμα(τός) -> ἀναλώμ(ατός). Following μ there is a sinusoid, -μα- would require an extra connecting stroke. l. 1, -> (ὑπὲρ). It seems to me that before τῶν, the ὑπὲρ abbreviation is written; though, I'm not that confident in this emendation. l. 1, -> τῶν. Untranscribed τῶν at the end of the line. l. 2, ἡμέρ(ας) -> ἡμερ(ῶν). Normalizing with the previous τῶν. μου in l. 1 is probably a misreading as well, but I can't come up with something better.
changed schema; added xml:space=preserve; indented; moved title/@n to idno
Added language la-Grek; tagged num rend=fraction
Converted from TEI P4 (EpiDoc DTD v. 6) to P5 (EpiDoc RNG schema)
